TopicTitle: COI indicator broken in VAB in 1.04

Articles.Content:
Make a new vessel in the VAB, throw in any part, enable the Center of Lift indicator. Note that it will be stuck on the floor. Oops!

If you load in a saved craft it may appear ok (on my modded install I usually play my old vessels show the COI fine but new ones do not).

See it in action here:

KSP 1.04

New Vessels only.

Windows 8.1

Edited June 25, 2015 by bmyers831
Center of lift will be at the scene origin point until you place a part that actually has lift, so try adding wings.
